模块 com.example.demo

程序包 com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

package com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager
  • 相关程序包
    程序包
    说明
    com.example.demo.Level
     
    com.example.demo.Level.LevelView
     
  • 类
    类
    说明
    ActiveActorManager
    Manages the active actors in the game, including friendly units, enemy units, user projectiles, enemy projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts.
    ActorSpawnerManager
    Manages the spawning of various actors (such as enemies, projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts) in the game.
    CleanDestroyedManager
    Manages the cleanup of destroyed actors in the game, removing them from the scene when they go out of bounds or are marked as destroyed.
    CollisionManager
    Manages the collision detection and handling for various actors in the game.
    EndGameMenuManager
    Manages the end game menu and transitions when the player wins or loses the game.
    ExplosionEffectManager
    Manages the explosion effects, including the explosion image and sound.
    PauseMenuManager
    Manages the pause menu in the game, including pausing and resuming the game, and applying/removing the blur effect to elements when the game is paused.
    UserInputManager
    Manages user input for controlling the player's plane and handling interactions such as movement, shooting, and pausing the game.
